statistical_note: Golden set has 90 mappings across 23 identities, generating 4005 pairwise comparisons. This is sufficient for threshold evaluation. The clean separation below 1.05 (zero false positives) is a strong signal. False positives above 1.05 are dominated by family resemblance, not random confusion.
